Title: Relates to the unlawful purchase or possession of a body vest
Summary: Relates to the unlawful purchase or possession of a body vest; prohibits the purchase or possession of a body vest; establishes that the purchase or possession of a body vest shall be a class A misdemeanor for a first offense and a class E felony for each subsequent offense.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to the unlawful purchase or possession of a body vest
